Subject: Invitation to discuss remote‑work trends on "Future of Work"

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Future of Work" podcast where we explore how workplaces are evolving in the digital age. Our recent episodes have covered hybrid work models, digital collaboration tools, and employee wellbeing—topics that have resonated strongly with our audience, especially around productivity tools and remote‑work software.

Given your acclaimed research on remote‑work productivity and employee engagement at UC Berkeley, we believe you’d provide invaluable insights for our upcoming episode titled "The Evolution of Remote Work: Balancing Productivity and Well‑being".

Would you be interested in joining us for a 30‑minute conversation? We’re flexible with scheduling and can record at a time that works best for you.

Looking forward to the possibility of featuring your expertise.

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Future of Work Podcast
alex@futureofworkpodcast.com
